title: Kaibutsu-Tachi Wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou No Shien Tokka Nouryoku De, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party Ni!
alternative_title: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！ ; The Boy Who Rules the Monsters
status: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！ ; The Boy Who Rules the Monsters
description:
Description :
        Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
